pullrequest.title: Highlighting of World Tree Items is fixed

content.raw:
The highlighting is much clearer, and this bug appears to be fixed.

As an aside, it seems weird that clicking on the text for Models and Lights causes those trees to expand and collapse, similar to clicking the little triangle to the left of the name. This doesn't happen for an actual model (like the ground_plane), which only expands and collapses by clicking the little triangle.

I'm guessing this occurs because Models and Lights don't have any properties of their own, but are more like folders that contain individual models and lights.

I wouldn't mind having the Models and Lights automatically expand when I click on them, but it's a little disorienting when they collapse. Should I file this as a separate issue?
content.html:
The highlighting is much clearer, and this bug appears to be fixed.

As an aside, it seems weird that clicking on the text for Models and Lights causes those trees to expand and collapse, similar to clicking the little triangle to the left of the name. This doesn't happen for an actual model (like the ground_plane), which only expands and collapses by clicking the little triangle.

I'm guessing this occurs because Models and Lights don't have any properties of their own, but are more like folders that contain individual models and lights.

I wouldn't mind having the Models and Lights automatically expand when I click on them, but it's a little disorienting when they collapse. Should I file this as a separate issue?

pullrequest.title: Highlighting of World Tree Items is fixed

content.raw: Can you show this to Steffi and see what she thinks?
content.html: Can you show this to Steffi and see what she thinks?

pullrequest.title: Highlighting of World Tree Items is fixed

content.raw:
I showed Steffi the code and she had 2 comments.

1. She would like to see highlighting for the Models and Lights when you click on them (currently Scene, Physics, the child models, and the child lights get highlighted, but not Models or Lights).

1. She would like the behavior of expandable elements to be uniform (currently single clicking on Models and Lights causes them to expand/collapse, while single clicking on a model with a subordinate link (eg. ground_plane) shows its properties but does not expand/collapse).
content.html:
I showed Steffi the code and she had 2 comments.

  1. She would like to see highlighting for the Models and Lights when you click on them (currently Scene, Physics, the child models, and the child lights get highlighted, but not Models or Lights).

  2. She would like the behavior of expandable elements to be uniform (currently single clicking on Models and Lights causes them to expand/collapse, while single clicking on a model with a subordinate link (eg. ground_plane) shows its properties but does not expand/collapse).

content.raw: It looks great. It addresses both of Steffi's comments.
